system.description: Effect: The user raises their ATK and SPATK stages by +1 for 5 activations. If the user is @Affliction[enraged], Work Up may be used as a Simple Action instead.

actions.name: Work Up
actions.description: Effect: The user raises their ATK and SPATK stages by +1 for 5 activations. If the user is @Affliction[enraged], Work Up may be used as a Simple Action instead.
